DOC.brief_summary: This prospective single-center study evaluate safety tolerability single dose `` APS ( TM ) '' treat patient OA knee fail conservative OA therapy . The study also evaluate efficacy assess patient pain functionality .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Intra-articular Injection Autologous Protein Solution ( `` APS ( TM ) '' ) Treatment Osteoarthritis ( OA )
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria : Male female ≥40 year . Willingness ability comply study procedure visit schedule ability follow verbal write instruction . A stand radiograph knee show Kellgren grade 2 3 Frequency knee pain day last month . Diagnosis unilateral knee OA Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤40 kg/m2 . Failed conservative OA therapy . Signed independent ethic committee ( IEC ) approve informed consent form ( ICF ) . Willingness abstain use topical pain therapy , intraarticular corticosteroid , viscosupplementation study . Willingness abstain systemic pain medication except rescue medication .
